description: This file declares the 'Badger' class which serves as a plugin component in the WPEFramework-based project. It includes method declarations for handling various app-related requests and device information retrieval, along with interface implementations and private member variables.

classes.name: Badger
classes.description: A plugin class implementing application gateway request handling for the WPEFramework, providing many device and application-specific functionalities.

methods.name: DeviceInfo
methods.description: Retrieves device info in JSON format for a given app ID.

methods.name: DeviceCapabilities
methods.description: Retrieves device capabilities in JSON format for a given app ID.

methods.name: NetworkConnectivity
methods.description: Retrieves network connectivity status in JSON for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceId
methods.description: Retrieves device ID in JSON format for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceName
methods.description: Retrieves device name in JSON format for a given app ID.

methods.name: ValidateCachedPermission
methods.description: Validates cached permissions for an app ID against required permission.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieves time zone info in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetHDCPStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDCP status in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetHDRStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDR status in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceType
methods.description: Retrieves device type in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetAudioModeStatus
methods.description: Retrieves audio mode status for an app ID.

methods.name: GetWebBrowserStatus
methods.description: Retrieves web browser status in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetWiFiStatus
methods.description: Retrieves WiFi status in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetNativeDimensions
methods.description: Retrieves native dimensions in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetVideoDimensions
methods.description: Retrieves video dimensions in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceModel
methods.description: Retrieves device model info in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: GetLocalizationPostalCode
methods.description: Retrieves postal code info in JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: ShowToaster
methods.description: Displays a toaster message for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetPayload
methods.description: Retrieves payload JSON for an app ID.

methods.name: OnLaunch
methods.description: Handles app launch request for a specific app ID.

methods.name: NavigateToCompanyPage
methods.description: Navigates to company page for a given app ID.

methods.name: PromptEmail
methods.description: Prompts email input for a given app ID.

methods.name: ShowPinOverlay
methods.description: Displays PIN overlay for an app ID.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Handles settings command with payload for an app ID.

methods.name: SubscribeToSettings
methods.description: Subscribes to settings updates for an app ID.

methods.name: EntitlementsAccountLink
methods.description: Handles entitlements account linking with payload for an app ID.

methods.name: MediaEventAccountLink
methods.description: Handles media event account linking with payload for an app ID.

methods.name: LaunchpadAccountLink
methods.description: Handles launchpad account linking with payload for an app ID.

methods.name: CompareAppSettings
methods.description: Compares app settings for a given app ID.

methods.name: XIFA
methods.description: Retrieves advertising ID for an app ID.

methods.name: AppStoreId
methods.description: Retrieves app store ID for an app ID.

methods.name: LimitAdTracking
methods.description: Checks if ad tracking is limited for an app ID.

methods.name: DeviceAdAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves device advertising attributes for an app ID.

methods.name: InitObject
methods.description: Initializes object with options for an app ID.

methods.name: AppAuth
methods.description: Performs app authentication for an app ID.

methods.name: OAuthBearerToken
methods.description: Retrieves OAuth bearer token for an app ID.

methods.name: XSCD
methods.description: Retrieves XSCD info for an app ID.

methods.name: RefreshPlatformAuthToken
methods.description: Refreshes platform auth token for an app ID.

methods.name: GetOat
methods.description: Retrieves 'OAT' info for an app ID.

methods.name: GetXact
methods.description: Retrieves 'XACT' info for an app ID.

methods.name: Deeplink
methods.description: Handles deeplink request for an app ID.

methods.name: NavigateToEntityPage
methods.description: Navigates to an entity page for an app ID.

methods.name: NavigateToFullScreenVideo
methods.description: Navigates to full screen video for an app ID.

methods.name: ResizeVideo
methods.description: Resizes video for an app ID.

methods.name: LogMoneyBadgerLoaded
methods.description: Logs the event when MoneyBadger is loaded, for an app ID.

methods.name: GetSystemInfo
methods.description: Retrieves system info for an app ID.

methods.name: MetricsHandler
methods.description: Handles metrics with payload for an app ID.

methods.name: Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down app for a given app ID.

methods.name: DismissLoadingScreen
methods.description: Dismisses loading screen for an app ID.
